channel.title: manda on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in manda on Barefoot Rob

item.title: no manda
item.description: 9:36pm Tuesday 9 February 1999 On Sunday night, Manda picked me up from the airport. I told her about the whole weekend and totally fell asleep with the understanding that I would see her on Monday at Project Heart. I didn’t talk to her all day Monday, which was okay; she’s got school and I had 71 email messages and website stuff with Dude, but she didn’t show up to Project Heart.

item.title: wasabi with Amanda
item.description: Houston Flooded 21:31 Friday 11 September 1998 Today started last night for me. Manda came over and we talked and chilled and she had brought some Japanese crab burritos or something like that: Crab, celery, rice, all rolled into a burrito shape with seaweed as the wrapper. Good stuff. She ate them mostly with soy sauce, I ate them mostly plain. Then she showed me the green stuff that came with the meal.
